name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Tutor for LSAT (supports LSAT Demon, 7Sage)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Assistant that explains LSAT questions for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's hard to understand LSAT questions even if you know the answer. And a tutor isn't always available. That's why we built AI Assistant. Click the extension while you are doing the drills or a practice test, and a chat will pop up to explain the question and its answer for you. 

Ask more questions if the first explanation isn't clear. It's the tutor with infinite patience.
